name: bixbyVolume_setValue
description: This function is used to set the volume of the Voice Assistant Bixby on SmartThings devices.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set Bixby's volume.

parameters.name: volumeLevel
parameters.description: The desired volume level for Bixby.
